HOW DO YOU DO THIS INSTALLATION???? WHEN I OPEN THE TORRENT I SEE ALOT OF THE SAME FILES AND THERE ALL ZIPPED?

WHAT AM I SUPPOSED TO DO?

Work well for me. Thank you! For those who have problems with installing, If you're using Vista or windows7, you have to switch off the account control before installing. Then mount ISO file with Daemon tool and run the set up file. Make sure you have microsoft DirectX and .net framework4 up to date before running the application.

Problem solved, chances are you installed this earlier, didnt do something right, uninstalled 3DSM and still cant get the keygen or something to work. First you need to remove the traces of previous installs. If you install CCleaner beforehand it will make life a lot easier. Uninstall 3ds max 2012, delete contents inside program files (Autodesk folder), also under x86 programs, AppData folder Autodesk contents, just search for everything Autodesk/3Ds Max. Then run the registry cleaner in CCleaner, clean all that out. Copy contents of the ISO to a local folder, install from there, place keygen in install directory, right click and "run as admin." (Antivirus companies get paid to add keygens as viruses, this one's good BTW, but still stay safe) Install program following the .txt file provided in crack folder. Select activate using offline method. Insert random bs for personal info. restart 3ds when it comes up. Select"Mem patch" keygen when at the license window (LMU.exe). When successfully patched, Delete all text in "Paste Auth Code Here" (Important), then paste the one provided in 3ds. Use that code in the program, you should be good! Dont worry, all boxes dont fill up. Hope this helps, no need to beat your wife now!
